_header: Behold a clear voice soundeth in / That all darkness
_description: James Ryman’s version of the hymn ‘Vox clara ecce intonat’, — five 4-line stanzas (aabb) and burden: ‘Vox clara ecce intonat / Obscura queque increpat / Pellantur procul sompnia / de celo cristus promicat’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Beholde a clere voice soundith inThat alle derkenes blameth of
                    synne…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Also vnto the holy goostBothe thre & one of myghtes
                    moost
